attributes.contentHtml: gothicflufflepuff lol i love Jen on how your trying to play victims we informed you right when you made a payment that you had to wait 24 - 48 hours to receive the Scripts about 2 hours later you make a PayPal case begging for your money back if you just asked i probs would have gave you it back but you lied to PayPal 8 different times then PayPal just closed the case in my favor i attempted to reach out to you because i didn't want to leave you with nothing but you informed me so here i am and yes you get invoices but not by me its called WHMCS
